steps.note: The problem has unresolved targets: the number of tiny gray bicycles on the left side of the brown metal sedan and the number of things to the left of the tiny green bicycle.

steps.intention: Determine the number of tiny gray bicycles on the left side of the brown metal sedan
steps.note: We need to count the tiny gray bicycles that are positioned to the left of the brown metal sedan in the diagram.

steps.intention: Determine the number of things to the left of the tiny green bicycle
steps.note: We need to count all objects that are positioned to the left of the tiny green bicycle in the diagram.
Compare the number of tiny gray bicycles on the left side of the brown metal sedan with the number of things to the left of the tiny green bicycle.
